original_text: And thou shalt set up the court round about, and hang up the hanging at the court gate.
korean_text: 또 뜰 주위에 포장을 치고 뜰 문에 휘장을 달고

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt set up the court round about
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 뜰 주위를 세울 것이요

sentences.original_text: and hang up the hanging at the court gate
